lyric.verse: Ka wa Chi wo suu kara BACHIN Me wa Tsukareru kara mabateki Warui ko oshioki Yoi ko wa nen ne Watashi wa? Migurushii kara BUSURI
lyric.chorus: Iyashii Hanarabide warau Hekonda mune na no ni itamu Masshiro na issho mo Dainashidashi Waraenai agaode Kyoo mo warau
lyric.verse: Uso dake tsuraneru kuchi Yokogao wa MAMA nide bishin?! Kawai ko PURIPURI Gehin ni WINK Watashi wa? Kaeranai kara ZUDON
lyric.chorus: Iyashii Hanarabide warau Hekonda mune na no ni itamu Masshiro na issho mo Dainashidashi Waraenai agaode Kyoo mo warau Bakakeda Yasashisa ni yareru Fukuramu mune ni Gin no hari GUSARI Okyoogyoku Ojigi wo sumasetara Sayonara wo Iwanakya
